activities: Learn.com, Inc. is a technology company that creates and projects on-demand e-learning solutions that enable its clients to administer every aspect of the client's training and learning initiatives, including design, tracking and implementation functionality. The Learn.com family of solutions includes the award-winning LearnCenter(R) learning management system (LMS/LCMS), the CourseMaker Studio(R) authoring tool, Mentor(R) EPSS and the 1,100 title Learn2(R)online course library.
eucountries: Belgium, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
